mapper.select: SELECT PI_ID, PI_NAME, PI_SEQ FROM PROCESS_INFO

SELECT ROWNUM rn , P_LOT_ID , P_PI_ID , P_B_ITEM_ID , P_PLAN_QUANTITY , P_ITEM_QUANTITY , P_DEFECTIVE_QUANTITY , TO_CHAR(P_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS P_START_DATE , TO_CHAR(P_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS P_END_DATE , P_STATUS , P_NOTE FROM PROCESS WHERE 1=1
AND P_START_DATE >= #{startDate}
AND #{endDate} >= P_END_DATE
ORDER BY rn ASC
